headline: Barletta Makes Campaign Stop In Butler
author: Tyler Friel
sentences: The governor’s job is to create a pathway to help you succeed, whether it’s healthcare, education, or manufacturing,” Barletta said.
“I’ve been able to in my whole political career to bring people from both sides, Republican and Democrat, together.
Barletta says his experience as a mayor and Congressman makes him the best candidate in a large field.
He also stressed creating an economic friendly environment and letting local leaders make decisions.
He talked with business owners on Main Street before having lunch at the Venue on Main.
Barletta says he got involved in the race because he opposed Wolf’s COVID policies.
Republican candidate for governor Lou Barletta made a stop in Butler yesterday.
Barletta is one of 11 declared candidates running for the GOP nomination.
It’s not about politics for me, it’s not about politicians.
And I have a record of doing that,” Barletta said.
You do that by standing up for the people.
